p.k: Tatarstan Symphony Orchestra and Alexander Sladkovsky: Strauss, Bruckner (2019).
p.d:
Tatarstan Symphony Orchestra, Alexander Sladkovsky (conductor) Mario Brunello (cello), Aidar Bagautdinov (viola)
Richard Strauss (1864 - 1949) Don Quixote, fantastic variations on a knightly theme for cello and viola soli and orchestra, Op. 35
Anton Bruckner (1824 - 1987) Symphony No. 9 in D minor
Recorded at the Tchaikovsky Hall, Moscow, 12 February 2019
